title: Alleged Clark stalker disruptive in court hearing
description: The man who allegedly stalked Caitlin Clark, Michael Lewis, is being held on $50,000 bail and ordered not to have any contact with Clark after a disruptive hearing Tuesday in Indianapolis.
author: Katie Barnes

title: Tomlin on teams eyeing trade: 'Save your time'
description: Mike Tomlin has a message for any team considering inquiring with the Steelers about his availability in a potential trade. "Save your time," he said Tuesday.
author: Brooke Pryor

title: 'Forest heroics undone by Slot's super sub on night of pure theatre'
description: Nottingham Forest's heroics were only undone by a genius double substitution by Liverpool boss Arne Slot, writes Phil McNulty.

title: James makes timely Chelsea return after 'lonely' lay-off
description: Chelsea full-back reflects on a "lonely" injury lay-off after scoring a late leveller to announce his Premier League return.

title: Fury announces retirement from boxing
description: Tyson Fury has announced his retirement from boxing with immediate effect.

title: Arsenal close on Zubimendi summer deal - but want striker now
description: Arsenal are closing in on a deal to sign Real Sociedad midfielder Martin Zubimendi in the summer, Sky Sports News understands - but the Gunners are working hard for a new striker this month.

title: Pacers' one-month turnaround has put the league on notice
description: Indiana has turned into one of the NBA's hottest teams. After an impressive win over the NBA-best Cavs on Sunday, can the Pacers run it back tonight?
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Matthew Sluka transfers to JMU after leaving UNLV over $100K NIL dispute
description: Matthew Sluka's UNLV career didn't work out, to say the least.
author: Yahoo Sports
